properties.areaDesc: Schuyler; Tompkins; Tioga; Southern Cayuga; Seneca; Steuben; Broome; Yates; Chemung
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:52AM EST until February 6 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an
inch.

* WHERE...The Finger Lakes to Southern Tier areas of Central New
York.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop this evening, which will
transition to sleet and freezing rain late tonight into
Thursday morning. Valleys may get warm enough for freezing rain
to change to rain shortly after dawn Thursday, but it may take
until late morning to get above freezing at higher elevations.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
